    • onEntityDamageByEntity

      public void onEntityDamageByEntity(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent event)
      Prevent PvP and PvM damage dependent upon PvP settings and location. Also handles EntityExplosions that damage entities.
      Parameters:
      event - - EntityDamageByEntityEvent

      public void onEntityTakesExplosionDamage(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent event)
      Prevent entity and block explosions and lightning from hurting entities. Doesn't stop damage to vehicles or hanging entities.
      Parameters:
      event - - EntityDamageEvent

    • onEntityInteract

      public void onEntityInteract(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityInteractEvent event)
      Handles: - vehicles that would trigger a switch, allowed if a permitted player is riding. - switch use and pressure plates triggered by Creatures.
      Parameters:
      event - - EntityInteractEvent

    • onEntityChangeBlockEvent

      public void onEntityChangeBlockEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityChangeBlockEvent event)
      Handles: Enderman thieving protected blocks. Ravagers breaking protected blocks. Withers blowing up protected blocks. Water being used to put out campfires. Boats breaking lilypads. Crop Trampling. Silverfish infesting blocks inside towns. Because we use ignoreCancelled = true we dont need to worry about setting the cancelled state to false overriding other plugins.
      Parameters:
      event - onEntityChangeBlockEvent

    • onEntityExplode

      public void onEntityExplode(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event)
      Decides how explosions made by entities will be handled ie: TNT, Creepers, etc.
      Handles wilderness entity explosion regeneration.
      Explosion blockList is filtered via the TownyActionEventExecutor, allowing Towny's war and other plugins to modify which blocks will be exploding.
      Parameters:
      event - - EntityExplodeEvent

    • onWindChargeExplode

      public void onWindChargeExplode(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event)
      Protects against players using Wind Charges to open doors and use switches.
      Parameters:
      event - - EntityExplodeEvent

    • onEntityCombustByEntityEvent

      Prevent fire arrows and charges igniting players when PvP is disabled
      Can also prevent tnt from destroying armorstands
      Parameters:
      event - - EntityCombustByEntityEvent
